price: Zakariyyaas (yaadadhu); yeroo inni Gooftaa isaatti lallabee “Gooftaa kiyya! Kophaa (ilma malee) nan dhiisin; Ati irra caalaa dhaaltotaati” (jedhe).
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā idh nādā rabbahu rabbi lā tadharnī fardan wa-anta khayru al-wārithīna
